sentence.Network_en: Patrick's boorish rudeness soon drove Monica's friends away.
sentence.Network_cn: 帕特里克的粗鲁无礼很快使得莫妮卡的朋友们想走了。
他的举止看上去很俗气.

sentence.Network_en: Though the man I introduced to you last night looks somewhat boorish, he is a diamond in the rough.
sentence.Network_cn: 我昨天晚上介绍给你认识的那个人虽然看上去有点没礼貌, 可他是个外粗内秀的人.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... boor n． 举止粗野的人，乡下人 boorish adj． 粗野的 boost v． 往上推，增加，提高.
华东师范大学考博词汇vocabulary - 豆丁网 ... bondage 奴役, 束缚 boorish 土气的, 粗鄙的 boost 促.
煽动者(n1) - 豆丁网 ... 108. Blunder n. (愚蠢粗心的)大错 109. Boorish adj. 粗鲁的 110. Bracket n. (墙上的)托架.
boor 农民boorish 农民的boosey 笨鹅

list.abs: the review by Duke's executive vice president was spurred by reports of boorish behavior lacrosse team , Alleva said .杜克大学执行副校长的检查对球队的“粗鄙行为”记录大加鞭策，艾利瓦说。

angered at the boorish behavior of a passenger , he picked the intercom , loudly submitted his resignation , pulled the ripcord , grabbed two beers and slid down the escape chute .他因为对一位乘客的粗鲁行为感到愤怒，拿起对讲机，大声宣布辞职，然后打开紧急安全门，抓着两瓶啤酒，从滑道滑下。
in the end , there might be some signs that boorish boys know they're overreaching-and that may be expressed in the level of their braggadocio .最后，也许有一些粗俗的男人发现自己过了头的迹象——这表现在他们吹牛的程度中。
boorish youths , behaviour , remarks ., 粗鲁的年轻人 , 举止 , 言语.
mention ill-mannered children and most people roll their eyes at the memory of ahellion and his boorish parents .一提到无礼的孩子，大多数人都会对记忆中惹是生非的小孩以及其粗鄙的父母皱起眉头。

entry.def: Boorish behaviour is rough, uneducated, and rude.

example.ex: ...their boorish rejection of the ageing movie star.
example.tran: 他们对这位老影星的无礼回绝

means.word_mean: 1. ill-mannered and coarse and contemptible in behavior or appearance;

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"像……一样,有……的",通常放在具体的名词后; 2. 表动词,"造成……,成……"
